works.description: This website http://www.casasantapia.com contains hundreds of pages of copy and paste copyright text and images including from our websites. Over the next weeks I will specify this material. (Check site:www.casasantapia.com - there are numerous copyright complaints there from Planetware, for example. 95% of website casasantapia.com is copy and paste copyright material). Let's start with http://www.casasantapia.com/engels/gaioleinchianti.htm. The text starting "First mention of the Gaiole territory..." comes from our site http://www.gaiole-in-chianti.com/ Notice that they copy our unusual use of "12 C" for "12th century".

The text beginning "Castello di Poggiarello di Stigliano is a small castle. . ." on http://www.casasantapia.com/engels/sovicille.htm comes from our page at http://www.val-di-merse.com/sovicille.htm. The text "The hermitage Eremo di Rosia was situated just a little off the road..." to ". . . what it once looked like" and the photo of Eremo di Rosia are taken from our page http://www.sovicille.net/rosia.htm

The text including begingin "better known as the Pieve di Ponte allo Spino and was originally built in the second half of the 12 C by Vallambrosan monks..." comes from our page http://www.sovicille.net/ - notice again our unusual spelling of "12 C" for "12th century"

The text begining "Castellina in Chianti is located on a ridge between the valleys of the Arbia, Elsa and Pesa rivers. The municipality of Castellina is entirely within the Chianti Classico wine zone . . " comes from our page http://www.castellina.com/ and is copied onto http://www.casasantapia.com/engels/surroundings.htm#surr The same page contains copies from our other sites.

The text beginning: "Castelnuovo Berardenga, at the southern border of the Chianti Classico wine territory, is a pleasant enough place to visit. . ." is from our page http://www.chianti.info/castelnuovo-berardenga.htm

The text beginning "The Villa Chigi Saracini was designed in the early 19 C by its owner, Galgano Saracini," (notice our unique spelling of "19 C" for "19th century") comes from our page http://www.castelnuovo-berardenga.com/chigi-saracini_eng.htm All of the other material on the offending pages is copied from other websites, some of them belonging to us.
